trainings.title: BNSSA
content: Awarded of Brevet National de Sécurité et de Sauvetage Aquatique (National Aquatic Safety and Rescue Certificate).
This is a French aquatic safety certification.

trainings.title: PET for School
content: Awarded PET for School.
English level : B1 Cambridge.
Design and 3D printing in a rehabilitation center
Inserting components and reworking solder joints
Component insertion and assembly of electronic equipment
Welcoming customers, handling routine inquiries and sales activity as receptionist
Welcoming customers, handling routine inquiries and sales activity as receptionist
Scientific mediation that aims to raise awareness of the sensitivity and fragility of the seabed. The project is suported by ISblue, ISblueHUB and Ifremer
A French national education scheme that aims to encourage academic ambition among secondary school students
Summer camp animator during 2 summers. With youngs from 11 to 15 years old
